questions.question: How does Grace handle self-healing?
questions.ground_truth_answer: Grace uses Guardian playbooks to detect and remediate issues automatically

questions.question: What is the governance approval process?
questions.ground_truth_answer: Tier 2/3 actions require whitelist approval before execution

questions.question: How does RAG ingestion work?
questions.ground_truth_answer: Content is chunked, embedded, and stored with provenance tracking

questions.question: What metrics does Grace track?
questions.ground_truth_answer: Grace tracks health, trust, confidence across 10 domains

questions.question: How does autonomous learning work?
questions.ground_truth_answer: Grace detects knowledge gaps and learns from whitelisted sources with approval gates
